content:
1/ New York's state legislature is set to consider a pair of bills that would require labels on AI-generated content and would put a three-year pause on new data center construction. The New York Fundamental Artificial Intelligence Requirements in News Act (NY FAIR News Act, for short) would require that any news "substantially composed, authored, or […] New York's state legislature is set to consider a pair of bills that would require labels on AI-generated content and would put a three-year pause on new data center construction. The New York Fundamental Artificial Intelligence Requirements in News Act (NY FAIR News Act, for short) would require that any news "substantially composed, authored, or […]

2/ We are a tech startup in the world of artificial intelligence, and we are in the process of building a smart home that is a lot smarter than our current home.

3/ We have been working on a new system for the past 10 years that allows us to do this, but we are still a small team and we are still working on it.
